trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Flint
There were no other sightings in Flint on or around October 20th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking across campus when I noticed moving objects in sky. There was 5-6 (sometimes they would fade out) objects going around in a circle, like they were playing tag or something. A young man walked by and I asked him what he saw. He said he saw lights in the sky and kept walking. As I left campus, they were still going in circles.
